com.mobius.vdrapi
Interface IColorDepth

public interface IColorDepth


A class implements IColorDepth to indicate that it can change colors of the page data while rendering the page.

You can save the following RenderFormatTypes as 1, 4, 8, or 24-bit images:

  • BMP
  • BMPRLE
  • PCX
  • PNG
  • TIF
  • TIFG3
  • TIFG32
  • TIFG4
  • TIFPACK
  • TIFHUFF
  • TIFJPEG

You can save the following RenderFormatTypes as 8 or 24-bit images:
  • JPEG
  • PSD
  • TGA

When the RenderFormatType is RAS, you can save the image as 1, 8, 24, or 32-bit images.

Method Summary
 void setBitsPerPixel(int BitsPP)
          Sets the color depth or the bits per pixel used while rendering the page.
 

Method Detail

setBitsPerPixel

public void setBitsPerPixel(int BitsPP)
Sets the color depth or the bits per pixel used while rendering the page. The default value for an IPageView object is the lowest color depth supported for the requested output format. For example, if the RenderFormatType is JPEG, the default color depth is set to 8 bits per pixel.
